abstract: The carmaker, whose operations have been severely disrupted since the earthquake and tsunami in Japan, said that it expects production to begin recovering sooner than forecast.
snippet: The carmaker, whose operations have been severely disrupted since the earthquake and tsunami in Japan, said that it expects production to begin recovering sooner than forecast.
lead_paragraph: Toyota, whose operations have been severely disrupted since the March 11 earthquake and tsunami in Japan, said Wednesday that its quarterly profit fell 77 percent but that it expected production to begin recovering up to two months sooner than previously forecast.
